name: Restapi
tagline: Pragmatic REST API Server Implementation on PHP
body:
This is an implementation of a Pragmatic REST API Server. For more info, I advise you to read/watch the following first to better grasp the concepts behind a Pragmatic REST API.

http://info.apigee.com/Portals/62317/docs/web%20api.pdf
http://www.vinaysahni.com/best-practices-for-a-pragmatic-restful-api
Stormpath's REST API Presentation

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5WXYw4J4QOU
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
